sk1.name: Strafe
sk1.desc: Clinkz attacks with a barrage of arrows. Dramatically increases attack speed for a short time.

sk2.name: Searing Arrows
sk2.desc:
Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.

Searing Arrows is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

sk3.name: Skeleton Walk
sk3.desc: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses an ability.

sk4.name: Death Pact
sk4.desc: Clinkz consumes the target friendly or enemy creep, gaining a percent of its hitpoints as max health and damage.
